sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The gettext package contains the gettext, gettextize, msgcmp, msgcomm, msgfmt, msgmerge, msgunfmt and xgettext programs.

sect3.title: gettext
sect3.para: The gettext package is used for internationalization (also known as i18n) and for localization (also known as l10n). Programs can be compiled with Native Language Support (NLS) which enable them to output messages in the users native language rather than in the default English language.

sect3.title: gettextize
sect3.para: No description is currently available for this program.
